LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.label: butcher creature
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.description: Butchers a creature to obtain its meat in usable form.
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.label: disassemble mechanoid
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.description: Disassembles a dead mechanoid into its component parts.
LanguageData.MakeKibble.label: make kibble
LanguageData.MakeKibble.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants.
